scripts.comment: start: Runs production server. dev: Dev server with nodemon. seed-admin: Create admin. lint/format: Code quality. test: Placeholder. build-client: Build React app. start-prod: Build client and run prod server. check-env: Validate environment variables.
scripts.check-env: node -e "if (!process.env.MONGO_URI || !process.env.JWT_SECRET) { console.error('FATAL ERROR: MONGO_URI and JWT_SECRET must be defined.'); process.exit(1); }"
